## Courses

**[Investment Management with Python and Machine Learning Specialization](https://www.coursera.org/specializations/investment-management-python-machine-learning)**  
4 courses from EDHEC Business School in Paris. Keywords: portfolio construction, factor models, risk management, diversification.  

**[Machine Learning and Reinforcement Learning in Finance Specialization](https://www.coursera.org/specializations/machine-learning-reinforcement-finance)**  
4 courses from New York University.  

**[Machine Learning for Trading - Coursera](https://www.coursera.org/specializations/machine-learning-trading)**  
3 courses from New York Institute of Finance. Focus on practical implementation in Python.  
  
**[Machine Learning for Trading - Udacity](https://www.udacity.com/course/machine-learning-for-trading--ud501)**  
Free course at Udacity from Georgia Tech. Keywords: probabilistic machine learning, linear regression, KNN and regression trees
